com.aj.android.commons.net

Class ConnectivityUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aj.android.commons.net.ConnectivityUtils

  • public class ConnectivityUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of utilities related to network connectivity and find network state .
    Author:
    Akhil Jain

        Returns:
        NetworkInfo -for active network.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
        PermissionNotDefinedException - if android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE permission is not defined.

      • isConnected

        public static boolean isConnected(Context context)
        Checks if there is any Network or Internet Connectivity, whether it be any type of network.
        Returns true if there is any connectivity.
        Parameters:
        context - -Context.
        Returns:
        boolean -if there is any active network connectivity.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
        PermissionNotDefinedException - if android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE permission is not defined.
        See Also:
        ConnectivityUtils#getActiveNetworkInfo(Context)}.

      • isConnectedWifi

        public static boolean isConnectedWifi(Context context)
        Check if the active network is WiFi network.
        Returns false if no active network is found.
        Parameters:
        context - -Context.
        Returns:
        boolean -if the active network is WiFi.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
        PermissionNotDefinedException - if android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE permission is not defined.
        See Also:
        #isConnectedWifi(Context, NetworkInfo)}.

      • isConnectedWifi

        public static boolean isConnectedWifi(Context context,
                                      NetworkInfo info)
        Check whether the give NetworkInfo is WiFi or not
        Parameters:
        context - -Context.
        info - -NetworkInfo.
        Returns:
        boolean -true if the given network info is WiFi, else false.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
        PermissionNotDefinedException - if android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE permission is not defined.
        See Also:
        {@link ConnectivityManager#TYPE_WIFI}.

      • isConnectionFast

        public static boolean isConnectionFast(int type,
                                       int subType)
        Check if the connection is fast for the given type and subtype.
        The method will only work above Android API Level 7 / VERSION_CODES#ECLAIR_MR1.
        Parameters:
        type - -int which can be either ConnectivityManager#TYPE_WIFI or ConnectivityManager#TYPE_MOBILE.
        subType - -int various types of TelephonyManager network type.
        Returns:
        boolean- true if the given type and subtype have fast network connectivity, else false.

        Throws:

      • getAllActiveNetworkInfo

        public static java.util.ArrayList<NetworkInfo> getAllActiveNetworkInfo(Context context)
        Gets an ArrayList of all active NetworkInfo.
        A network is active, if its connected or connecting.
        Parameters:
        context - -Context.
        Returns:
        <{@link NetworkInfo}> for all the active networks.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
        PermissionNotDefinedException - if android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE permission is not defined.

      • getNetworkInfo

        public static java.lang.String getNetworkInfo(NetworkInfo info)
        Gets a String with necessary information about the network separated by new line character \n.
        Information such as network type id, type and sub-type name, state of the network and etc.
        Parameters:
        info - -NetworkInfo.
        Returns:
        String -information about the network.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.

      • isLowBandwidthNetwork

        public static boolean isLowBandwidthNetwork(Context context)
        Check if the active network is low bandwidth network.
        A network is low bandwidth if its TelephonyManager#NETWORK_TYPE_GPRS or TelephonyManager#NETWORK_TYPE_EDGE.
        Parameters:
        context - -Context.
        Returns:
        boolean -if active network is low bandwidth then true ,else false.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
        PermissionNotDefinedException - if android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE permission is not defined.

      • checkMobileDataState

        public static boolean checkMobileDataState(Context context)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Check state of mobile data connectivity (on/off).
        It only checks if mobile data is turned on/off.
        Parameters:
        context - -Context.
        Returns:
        boolean -true if enabled, false if disabled.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
        java.lang.Exception - General purpose for safe case.
